entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to wet snow or rain this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Wet snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Wet snow or rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 800 metres in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Snow level 800 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
